reputations.name: Violence
reputations.description: You have a reputation for violence and brutality. People fear you. You get a -1 penalty to all Reaction rolls. Enemies suffer a -1 penalty to morale checks.

reputations.name: Deceit
reputations.description: You have a reputation for lying and scheming. People watch you closely. You get a -1 penalty to all Reaction rolls. Enemies get a -1 penalty to perception checks against other things while interacting with you.

reputations.name: Cowardice
reputations.description: You have a reputation for cowardice and running. People will not count on you. You get a -1 penalty to all Reaction rolls. Enemies are always surprised by your first attack.

reputations.name: Generosity
reputations.description: The people say you're generous and kind. You get a +1 bonus on all Reaction rolls and Charisma checks with the clergy and the common people. They will, of course, expect to be rewarded.

reputations.name: Fairness
reputations.description: The merchants say you've always been fair and honest in your dealings. You get a +1 bonus on all Reaction rolls and ability checks when trying to strike bargains with clerks, courtiers, and merchants.

reputations.name: Mercy
reputations.description: Warriors say you're merciful to your opponents. You get a +1 bonus on all Reaction rolls and Diplomacy checks in your interactions with military leaders and other martial characters who've heard of you.
